subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Martin Brodeur stopped 33 shots for the Devils, but Gilbert Brule and Marc Pouliot scored and Jeff Deslauriers earned his third shutout of the season in the Oilers’ victory.
snippet: Martin Brodeur stopped 33 shots for the Devils, but Gilbert Brule and Marc Pouliot scored and Jeff Deslauriers earned his third shutout of the season in the Oilers’ victory.
